formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: StopMonitor Synopsis: Stop monitoring a channel Privilege: call,all Description: The 'StopMonitor' action may be used to end a previously started 'Monitor' action. The only parameter is 'Channel', the name of the channel monitored.
